name: VEG TD
description:
Build your Towers, Mod your Towers, Inject Skills into your towers.

Use your wits to stop the growing processed menace, construct towers of different effects to quash the waves of processed enemies whom want a processed world.

This game is still in development and currently in Alpha state. We're building this game together with anyone who talks to us! So join us on Discord, tell us what you think about VEG TD or VEG and what features you want to see on the go.

Got an idea for a tower? Got an idea for a mod? Got an idea for a Level? Got an idea for an enemy? got any thoughts at all? Talk to us.

The enemies will not give you a break, the towers you build, the mods you use and the skills you purchase will ultimately determine your success, beat levels and purge the processed to unlock stronger modifications and skills for your towers to utilise. Progress through the Garden and start to take the fight to them.
